name: They are Confined
description:
My entry for the Dream Diary Jam 6. I hope you'll enjoy it.

⚠️This game has implications or suggests: Sexual assault, Blood, Religious Motifs, Death, Implied forced Abortion⚠️

-

⚠️ Please do not play if these materials are triggering or harmful to your well-being.⚠️ You will need a program that can extract .rar files (ex: WINRAR, free to use program)

This game has no "Effects" to collect. Your goal is to find / view particular "Events" that will lead you to the end.

There is only 1 Ending. 

If you're stuck, try interacting with some of the NPCs in the areas.

This game is only made for Windows. My apologies to other OS users.

After downloading, make sure to launch the game from the folder, using the NW.js application shown below.

Please let me know if there are any bugs I may have missed.
